description: This file defines an Angular component 'HomeComponent' for the homepage of a recipe browsing application. It specifies the component's metadata, including its selector, imported modules and components, template, and styles. The class contains properties for display text.

classes.name: HomeComponent
classes.description: Angular component serving as the homepage for the recipe application. It provides properties for the title and subtitle displayed on the page.

methods.name: HomeComponent
methods.description: Constructor of the component; currently has no logic.

ctags.name: subtitle
ctags.pattern: /^  subtitle = 'Browse, search, and cook delicious meals with our curated collection of recipes';$/

fields.name: subtitle = 'Browse, search, and cook delicious meals with our curated collection of recipes';
